item.title: dt
item.description:
dt is a utility and functional-concatenative programming language.
It provides some new ways of scripting and gluing programs together in Unix-like systems like Mac OSX, Linux, and BSD.

https://github.com/so-dang-cool/dt

item.title: Pixi
item.description:
A nice GUI program, written in Zig, that helps you create art, what’s not to love?

https://github.com/foxnne/pixi

item.title: Buzz
item.description:
Buzz is a lightweight language written in Zig that compiles to bytecode and runs in a JITted VM.

You can learn more on the official website:

https://buzz-lang.dev/
